attributes.action: Furlough key workers on unpaid leave due to being higher risk from COVID19.
attributes.additional_details: It is simply unfair that people with health conditions that place them in higher risk groups are being forced to work or take unpaid leave while so many with no underlying health conditions are entitled to Furlough because they are not classed as essential. Without a shielding letter the vulnerable are either left without pay or they have to go to work in a place where social distancing is often impossible. Now is the time to help ALL those who need it. Let them have furlough!
attributes.background: The government needs to support key workers who are on unpaid leave due to health problems that place them at higher risk from coronavirus.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:

Require all vulnerable and at risk people to stop going to work: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/305270

Cover 80% of wages for people who are having to shield for 12 weeks: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/310424
